articles.headline: Oregon lands No. 1 safety Washington, nephew of Kobe Bryant
articles.description: Four-star prospect Jett Washington, ESPN's No. 1 safety in the 2026 class, announced his commitment to Oregon over Alabama and USC on Thursday night.

articles.headline: Brandon Arrington, No. 1 athlete prospect in 2026, picks Texas A&M
articles.description: Brandon Arrington, the No. 1 athlete prospect and 14th overall recruit in the 2026 ESPN 300, has committed to Texas A&M.

articles.headline: How every five-star college football recruit fits at his new school
articles.description: There are 21 five-stars in the Class of 2026. We look at how they got to their teams and what they'll do in college.

images.name: Chris Henry Jr. [608x342]
images.caption: Chris Henry Jr. committed to Ohio State in July of 2023.

images.name: Keenyi Pepe [800x800]
images.caption: Keenyi Pepe adds another impressive building block to USC's OL class.

articles.byline: Craig Haubert, Eli Lederman and Tom Luginbill

articles.headline: College football recruiting intel: Elite 11 Finals and June's final official visit weekend
articles.description: What we're hearing about one of the most important weekends on the recruiting calendar.

images.name: Landon Duckworth [608x342]
images.caption: Landon Duckworth is one of the top remaining undecided quarterbacks in the Class of 2026.

images.name: Lincoln Riley [608x342]
images.caption: Lincoln Riley's Trojans have the country's deepest recruiting class.

articles.headline: CFP leaders say 'everything's on the table' after meetings wrap
articles.description: CFP executive director Rich Clark said "pretty much everything's on the table" for potential formats for 2026 and beyond but that the group would like to make a decision by the fall.

images.name: Heather Dinich breaks down likelihood of 5+11 CFP format
images.caption: Heather Dinich joins Paul Finebaum to discuss conferences debating whether five automatic bids and 11 at-large ones for 16-team playoff is the future of CFP.

articles.headline: OT Ekene Ogboko, No. 50 in class of '26, commits to Georgia
articles.description: Four-star offensive tackle prospect Ekene Ogboko, No. 50 in the 2026 ESPN 300, has committed to Georgia over Clemson, Florida and Notre Dame, he told ESPN on Wednesday.

images.name: Georgia Bulldogs [600x400]
images.caption: Five-star DT Elijah Griffin has committed to Georgia, turning down Miami and USC.

videos.headline: NC State LB Caden Fordham ejected for targeting
videos.description: NC State linebacker Caden Fordham gets ejected two minutes into the game for targeting against Western Carolina.

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (NC State LB Caden Fordham ejected for targeting) 2024/08/29 ESHEET

videos.headline: NC State's mascot takes an unfortunate tumble
videos.description: NC State's mascot, Ms. Wuf, takes a fall during pregame ceremonies but quickly gets back up and waves to the crowd.

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (NC State's mascot takes an unfortunate tumble) 2024/8/29 ESHEET

videos.headline: Western Carolina interception leads to early TD
videos.description: Western Carolina cashes in a huge interception by Ken Moore Jr. with a touchdown pass to Jake Young.

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (Western Carolina interception leads to early TD) 2024/08/29 ESHEET

videos.headline: Kevin Concepcion brings NC State level with receiving TD
videos.description: Grayson McCall finds Kevin Concepcion open with a nice catch to bring NC State level vs. Western Carolina shortly after going behind.

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (Kevin Concepcion brings NC State level with receiving TD) 2024/08/29 ESHEET

videos.headline: AJ Colombo's TD puts Western Carolina back in front
videos.description: AJ Colombo dives into the end zone to restore Western Carolina's lead vs. NC State.

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (AJ Colombo's TD puts Western Carolina back in front) 2024/08/29 ESHEET

videos.headline: Western Carolina's Cole Gonzales uses his legs for 50-yard gain
videos.description: Western Carolina QB Cole Gonzales makes a huge 50-yard gain with his legs vs. NC State.

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (Western Carolina's Cole Gonzales uses his legs for 50-yard gain) 2024/08/29 ESHEET

videos.headline: Kevin Concepcion scores his 2nd TD for NC State
videos.description: Kevin Concepcion comes up big again for NC State as he notches his second receiving touchdown of the game vs. Western Carolina.

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (Kevin Concepcion scores his 2nd TD for NC State) 2024/08/29 ESHEET

videos.headline: Branson Adams rushes in for Western Carolina TD
videos.description: Branson Adams finds the opening to run in the touchdown for Western Carolina vs. NC State.

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (Branson Adams rushes in for Western Carolina TD) 2024/08/29 ESHEET

videos.headline: Kevin Concepcion gets his 3rd TD for NC State
videos.description: Kevin Concepcion and Grayson McCall combine for a 35-yard NC State touchdown vs. Western Carolina.

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (Kevin Concepcion gets his 3rd TD for NC State) 2024/08/29 ESHEET

videos.headline: Jordan Waters powers in rushing TD for NC State
videos.description: Jordan Waters powers his way to the end zone to extend NC State's lead vs. Western Carolina.

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (Jordan Waters powers in rushing TD for NC State) 2024/08/29 ESHEET

videos.headline: Jordan Waters ices game for NC State with 50-yard rushing TD
videos.description: Jordan Waters goes on a blistering 50-yard rush to seal the win for NC State vs. Western Carolina.

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (Jordan Waters ices game for NC State with 50-yard rushing TD) 2024/08/29 ESHEET
